lines:
1956

October 
Fifth 
1 9 1 1.

Mr. S. C. Luk,

224 North Wayne Street,

Angola, Indiana,

My dear Luka

The inclosed bill has just been received and I imagine that it is 
intended for you. It seems like e pretty large one, however, and I am not 
willing to pay it until I have been authorized by you to do so. If it is 
correct will you kindly 0. Ke and return to me? The initials are not right 
and I am wondering if possibly the bill belongs to Sun. Please give ne what

information you can.

Faithfully yours,

Principal.
raw: 1956 October Fifth 1 9 1 1. Mr. S. C. Luk, 224 North Wayne Street, Angola, Indiana, My dear Luka The inclosed bill has just been received and I imagine that it is intended for you. It seems like e pretty large one, however, and I am not willing to pay it until I have been authorized by you to do so. If it is correct will you kindly 0. Ke and return to me? The initials are not right and I am wondering if possibly the bill belongs to Sun. Please give ne what information you can. Faithfully yours, Principal.

metadata.name: Phillips Academy
metadata.abstract: Letter enclosing a bill with a request to authorize it since the amount is so large. Stearns asks if it might have been incurred by [F.] Sun.
metadata.collection: Head of School (Stearns) correspondence with Chinese alumni
